mapper.select: SELECT SUM(t.STAY_TOURISTS) STAY_TOURISTS,to_char(t.stat_hour, 'HH24:MI') RQTIME FROM REGION_REALTIME_SUM t WHERE t.stat_hour>=to_date(#{statHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.region_id in( select s.id from REGION_CFG s) group by t.stat_hour order BY RQTIME

SELECT SUM(t.STAY_TOURISTS) STAY_TOURISTS FROM REGION_REALTIME_SUM t WHERE t.stat_hour >= (select max(stat_hour) - interval '1' hour from region_realtime_sum) and t.region_id in(select s.id from REGION_CFG s) group by t.stat_hour order by t.stat_hour desc

select count(1) as REGION_NUM, count(case when tt.color!=0 then 1 end) as redAlarm from ( select ss.region_name as scenicName,ss.id id, case when a.num<ral.level4_num then trunc(a.num/ral.level4_num*0.25,2)*100 when a.num<ral.level3_num then trunc((a.num-ral.level4_num)/(ral.level3_num-ral.level4_num)*0.25+0.25,2)*100 when a.num<ral.level2_num then trunc((a.num-ral.level3_num)/(ral.level2_num-ral.level3_num)*0.25+0.5,2)*100 when a.num<ral.level1_num then trunc((a.num-ral.level2_num)/(ral.level1_num-ral.level2_num)*0.25+0.75,2)*100 when a.num>=ral.level1_num then trunc(a.num/ral.level1_num,2)*100 else 0 end as yuZhi, nvl(a.num,0) as touristNum, case when a.num<ral.level4_num then '0' when a.num<ral.level3_num then '1' when a.num<ral.level2_num then '2' when a.num<ral.level1_num then '3' when a.num>=ral.level1_num then '4' else '0' end as color,ral.level1_num as max from region_alarm_level ral left join (select s.id ,nvl(sum(stay_tourists),0) as num,s.region_name from REGION_CFG s right join region_realtime_sum r on r.region_id=s.id where r.stat_hour=(select max(stat_hour) from region_realtime_sum ) group by s.id,s.region_name)a on ral.region_id=a.id right join REGION_CFG ss on ral.region_id=ss.id order by yuzhi desc,num desc) tt
SELECT SUM(t.IN_TOURISTS) STAY_TOURISTS FROM REGION_REALTIME_SUM t WHERE t.stat_hour >=to_date(#{statHour},'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.region_id in( select s.id from REGION_CFG s)
select trunc(nvl(sum(t.totalminutes)/sum(t.tourists),0)/60,2) as STAY_MIN from REGION_STATS_BYMONTH t where to_char(t.stat_month,'yyyy-MM')=to_char(sysdate - interval '1' month , 'yyyy-MM')
